messages.content: What is the purpose of the PC_Icon_creator_Workflow tool?
The PC_Icon_creator_Workflow tool is used to create 2D icons for icons as well as UI workflows within the ComfyUI framework.
How can I generate custom icons using the PC_Icon_creator_Workflow?

To generate custom icons, you would configure the control retcion within the ComfyUI, then go to the Node-Size configurator and set the Width to 64 and Height to 64. After that, you can start creating your icon.
What are the features offered by the PC_Icon_creator_Workflow?
PC_Icon_creator_Workflow supports composition nodes, enable Child-Node, overwrite default color function, and apply on-editor mode.
What can be done using the ComfyUI-SaveAs GUI?
ComfyUI-SaveAs GUI is used for storing the workflow in Comfy process project.
How do I save a workflow using ComfyUI-SaveAs?
To save a workflow using ComfyUI-SaveAs, you create a directory, then open ComfyUI, go to File â†’ Save As, and choose the directory, then globally save the project.
What is the ComfyUI-Manager extension for?
The ComfyUI-Manager extension is used to manage ComfyUI projects.
How do I manage ComfyUI projects using the ComfyUI-Manager extension?
To manage ComfyUI projects using the ComfyUI-Manager extension, you open the ComfyUI project, go to the ComfyUI manager, open the project manager, and then select Open or Close.
